title: Ticket #1901: RFE: CONDOR_VIEW_CLASSAD_TYPES
description:
The Collector currently hard codes the ads it will forward to the View Collector, specifically Startd and Submitter ads.

The View Collector can be useful as a filtered view of the ads beyond just Machine ads. For instance, condor_userprio results or sending commands to all Masters in a pool.

RFE to generalize the ad forwarding.

For example:

CONDOR_VIEW_CLASSAD_TYPES = Machine,Submitter

...would be the default current behavior, which could be added to like:

CONDOR_VIEW_CLASSAD_TYPES = Machine,Submitter,DaemonMaster,Negotiator
